panels.title: 容器所在主机-磁盘性能
容器所在主机-网络性能

targets.expr:
sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"$Pod",container =~"$Container",container !="",container!="POD",namespace=~"$NameSpace",node=~"^$Node$"}[2m])) by (container, pod, node) 
/
 (sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{pod=~"$Pod",container =~"$Container",container !="",container!="POD",namespace=~"$NameSpace",node=~"^$Node$"}/100000) by (container, pod, node)) * 100

sum (container_memory_rss{pod=~"$Pod",container =~"$Container",container !="",container!="POD",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace"}) by (container, pod) /0.8
-
sum (container_memory_rss{pod=~"$Pod",container =~"$Container",container !="",container!="POD",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace"}) by (container, pod) >0

panels.title: 低于建议内存值的容器
